title: Biden, Trump and CNN
sub_head: Coverage of a dubious claim by a Washington Post columnist shows the cable network at a crossroads.
body:
Is CNN trying to turn the page on its era of sharply partisan programming? The cable outletâ€™s response to a bizarre claim from a Washington Post writer suggests that within the network there are at least two points of view on how to cover the Biden presidency.
As for the claim circulated by the Washington Post, it arrives under the following amusing headline:
